title: Can't Appeal Chat Restriction
body: I asked my teammates in chat queue what lane was left and got no response, so i then said ok I will go top. Udyr followed me and harrassed me and even went afk. I was harrassed by my teammates and at least defended myself. I am willing to post chat log. I would ideally like to speak to a rioter. Thank you.

replies.body:
You cant appeal chat restrictions.

Work it off like everyone else (ARAM helps) and think about what you did wrong and how futile it is to argue with toxic trash and/or or _be_ toxic trash.

TL;DR dont feed the trolls.

You are judged purely by your own behavior, not how it related to others. Defending yourself just feeds the trolls, silence starves them.

Not a very bad log, though. Looks like the system was a little aggressive.
I don't understand how ACTUAL toxic players only get chat restrictions... I will forever be resentful to Riot since I can't trust the consistency in their system.

When you started defending yourself you likely used some harassment language. Which is why you got a CR, mute report move on is what you are expected to do.
Want to speak with a rioter, open a support ticket
the boards is a community driven effort, with volunteer staff
who will likely tell you similar things in better ways

The worse thing I said was "stupid liberal" that deserves a chat ban? Udyr went afk I wonder if riot actually penalized him. So essentially if my team hates me, riot sides with the mob. Thanks tho for the fast response.
